channel.title: Wonder & Welcome
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast about parenting and following Jesus.
channel.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast conversation about parenting and following Jesus, hosted by Seth and Shannon Hein.
channel.description: A podcast conversation about parenting and following Jesus, hosted by Seth and Shannon Hein.

item.title: 7: Prayer and Fasting
item.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
item.itunes:subtitle: Wonder & Welcome: 7: Prayer and Fasting
item.itunes:summary: Seth and Shannon discuss how they have including their children in times of prayer and fasting in the life of their church. There are lots of difficulties, but the work is worth it.
item.description: Seth and Shannon discuss how they have including their children in times of prayer and fasting in the life of their church. There are lots of difficulties, but the work is worth it. Show notes available at http://localhost:4000/2023/episode-007.html

item.title: 6: Weird Encouragements
item.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
item.itunes:subtitle: Wonder & Welcome: 6: Weird Encouragements
item.itunes:summary: Shan remembers things friends have said to her that turned out to be weirdly encouraging.
item.description: Shan remembers things friends have said to her that turned out to be weirdly encouraging. Show notes available at http://localhost:4000/2023/episode-006.html

item.title: 5: In Alphabetical Order
item.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
item.itunes:subtitle: Wonder & Welcome: 5: In Alphabetical Order
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, we talk with the hilariously wonderful Curt and Brenda McCutchan.
item.description: In this episode, we talk with the hilariously wonderful Curt and Brenda McCutchan. Show notes available at http://localhost:4000/2023/episode-005.html

item.title: 4: A Communicative God
item.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
item.itunes:subtitle: Wonder & Welcome: 4: A Communicative God
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, we welcome our very first guest parents and talk about prayer, community, and the importance of working together.
item.description: In this episode, we welcome our very first guest parents and talk about prayer, community, and the importance of working together. Show notes available at http://localhost:4000/2023/episode-004.html

item.title: 3: Special Introductions
item.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
item.itunes:subtitle: Wonder & Welcome: 3: Special Introductions
item.itunes:summary: Today we are sharing with you a parenting seminar from the Confluence 2023 conference, with 4 of our favorite people: Rick and Gayle Hein, and Curt and Brenda McCutchan. Over the next few episodes we will be having both couples on as guests to share more wisdom, insights, and stories!
item.description: Today we are sharing with you a parenting seminar from the Confluence 2023 conference, with 4 of our favorite people: Rick and Gayle Hein, and Curt and Brenda McCutchan. Over the next few episodes we will be having both couples on as guests to share more wisdom, insights, and stories! Show notes available at http://localhost:4000/2023/episode-003.html

item.title: 2: Not Unsolicited Comments
item.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
item.itunes:subtitle: Wonder & Welcome: 2: Not Unsolicited Comments
item.itunes:summary: Input can feel like an attack, but it is often a gift. In this episode, Seth and Shannon discuss the importance of receiving input and feedback in parenting.
item.description: Input can feel like an attack, but it is often a gift. In this episode, Seth and Shannon discuss the importance of receiving input and feedback in parenting. Show notes available at http://localhost:4000/2023/episode-002.html

item.title: 1: Encouragers and Squashers
item.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
item.itunes:subtitle: Wonder & Welcome: 1: Encouragers and Squashers
item.itunes:summary: Seth and Shannon make introductions, explain the meaning behind the name Wonder & Welcome, and share stories of encouraging and squashing wonder and welcome.
item.description: Seth and Shannon make introductions, explain the meaning behind the name Wonder & Welcome, and share stories of encouraging and squashing wonder and welcome. Show notes available at http://localhost:4000/2023/episode-001.html
